description:
Simple Action to randomize the action of picking something.

You can set the probabilities to get yes over no.

It will set the boolean true or false, on bubble yes or no.

NEED HELP BUILDING A CUSTOM APPLICATION?
https://dev.zeroqode.com

SUPERCHARGE YOUR APP WITH ZEROQODE PLUGINS
https://zeroqode.com/plugins

QUESTIONS OR NEED HELP?
https://forum.zeroqode.com
name: Inactivity refresh
plugin_instructions:
1. Install Plugin on your app.
2. Set the refresh after x time of inactivity or turn it off and use the state after x time of inactivity
